instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALLATION: Run 'npm install lucide-react recharts framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge' immediately.
3. THEME: Force dark mode in tailwind.config.js or apply 'dark' class to html/body by default.
4. LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento Grid' strategy for the Dashboard Home. Don't just stack cards.
5. VIRAL SCORE: Always display the 'Viral Score' prominently using the primary neon color (#BEF264).
6. GLASSMORPHISM: Use the provided glass classes for all cards and overlays. Do not use solid opaque backgrounds for cards.
7. CHARTS: Use Recharts. Customize the Tooltip to be a glass card. Hide grid lines or make them very subtle (#ffffff10).
8. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs for placeholders. Do not leave empty image blocks.
9. NAVIGATION: Create a sidebar for desktop and a bottom nav for mobile. Use Lucide icons.
10. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
